website_summaries.verdict: Consumers who need a basic padlock and prefer combination codes to keys will appreciate this model for basic locking needs, but it's not for top-security applications.
pros: An affordable, secure combination padlock that offers over 10,000 possible combinations
Ideal for basic use indoors and out
cons: Built for light-duty needs, as it won't hold up to bolt cutters
Numbers are small and may be difficult for some users to read

customer_reviews.title: OK Lock - Customer followup spam
customer_reviews.text: This lock is OK I guess, feels pretty cheap in the hand and is probably pretty easy to break open, but you get what you pay for. I'm using it as a gym lock and it will probably do fine for me. The one star review comes from the spam email this company sends after. Lots of companies do this, which is crazy annoying, but this company had a headline of "RE: Remember me?". So, spammy company, please remember my bad review when writing your next set of spam mail headlines. Amazon really needs to cut down on this practice.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL WEATHER
customer_reviews.text: This lock is not all weather. The hasp part rusted and is supposed to be stainless. Sand got into the combination part and lock would not work. I tried to return it but company has not been cooperative. I am very unhappy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Poppleton

customer_reviews.title: I needed a lock to place on my wrought iron gate and this one looked like it fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don't this lock justice! I needed a lock to place on my wrought iron gate and this one looked like it fit the bill. It actually exceeded my expectations. Sturdy as heck and easy to read numbers. I also like the fact that there are 4 digits to program. The programming of your security code is easy peasy. The packing is better than most of the high end electrical things or clothing that I have purchased on amazon. Excellent. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: susie sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to spot, works well
customer_reviews.text: I have no trouble remembering which locker I chose at the gym, this little green lock is easy to spot. I've used a few times and had no trouble at all. I noticed that it came with the 0000 set to the middle or side position, but since it is easier to see and move the front, I set the numbers I will remember to that column. (this will make more sense when you have it in your hands.) I like this lock so far. I always struggled with the dial type combination locks and with remembering a combination that I did not choose. This solves both problems and it is my favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Kelker

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gym
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful and reliable combination lock. It comes with a set of directions to set the combination, however, there are also instructions online that are step by step with pictures. It took me less than a minute to set the combination and test it out to make sure everything was working. The lock stands out and will be easily identifiable at the gym. It comes in an assortment of colors to stand out among the various black and gray locks one normally sees on lockers or other areas requiring a lock. Definitely a great little asset to your workout routine should you be in the market for a gym lock.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa N.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I tried ALL DAY to get this thing to work! I went over and over the instructions. And i couldn't find the website even though I put in the address provided. I paid 12$ for this thing and plan on returning it. Suppose to be a simple, uncomplicated little gadget that a almost produced a stroke in my brain no star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C

customer_reviews.title: Locked itself and won't unlock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on a locker at the gym. It worked great for about 20 times. Today, I went to put the lock on the locker and found the lock has locked itself with the shackle not in the body and will not unlock no matter how many times and how many ways I put in the code numbers. I know the code is correct because I took a picture of it when I first set the numbers. I'm thankful it didn't stop working with my clothes locked in the locker. Look at the other reviews, this isn't uncommon for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sims

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these about a week so far, so no telling how they'll do just yet in an outside environment, but they are well built and easy to work with so far. I'll update if they have issues (that WD-40 doesn't solve) from being outside in the elements for a while. Update: I've had these for a few months now, they stand up to the elements outside well, even being sprayed directly by a sprinkler. A bit of WD-40 or other lubricant polishes up any difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Priest

customer_reviews.title: Keeps honest people honest, but no match for the rest.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good lock. My only complaint was that you had to have the combination dialed in to close the lock. That's until someone broke it off my gym locker and stole my gym bag. It's a very busy gym, and there always seems to be someone in the locker room, so I'm surprised no one noticed. While the bag was found later, a $20 I keep in the bag for emergencies was gone, so I figured it was time for a better lock. I went with the Master Lock 178D, which turned out to be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: R. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy secure lock with 4 tumblers
customer_reviews.text: The company immediately shipped the Padlock. Their service and support are excellent including their instructions. Which by the way were also sent to me by email just in case I wanted to see them before the product arrived. The lock has the added benefit of have 4 numbers over 3 numbers. This greatly increases protection because of the many more possible combinations to unlock it. It is well built and sturdy. I'm glad I purchased this lock over their competitors. I've purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas  Megenity

customer_reviews.title: Solid, light lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is sturdy, attractive and fits easily into a gym locker. Like the selection of colors and that you pick the color of your choice. This lock is ideal for lockers unless you are returning after a swim or shower or if you require reading glasses. I find that it’s difficult to turn the combination wheels while your fingers are wet and the small numbers difficult to read due to the shiny numbers as both the numbers and wheels are shiny metallic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this on her school locker. After only using 1 month it would not work & had to be cut off.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie0000

customer_reviews.title: Unreadable at night, even with a flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The numbers on the lock are barely visible in sunlight or indoors, but at night they are nearly impossible to decipher. Because they are just indents on shiny metal, a flashlight glares against the surface and the numbers can not be read. I have to use a magnifying glass app *and* turn the numbers several rotations before I can make out one it is currently on. Unbelievably hard to use for outdoor purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Especially great for child with disabilit
customer_reviews.text: My son has developmental delays and the standard lock just wasn't working for him. We tried this lock and it's working great. We were able to pick the code that he could easily remember. Lining up the code is quick and easy. I would highly recommend this lock for any child for school. I also had nice communication with the seller. Great shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barness

customer_reviews.title: LOCK CAME JAMMED
customer_reviews.text: What a freaking waste of time! I was pissed! I signed up to a gym and waited 2 days to get the lock so I can actually go to the gym and not have to drag my bag and my coat around with me. The lock did not work. After many attempts of trying to make it work, and having other people help me, nothing! I had to go to the ups and drop it off for return. I Went to staples and picked up a lock for 5.99 which is cheaper and works wonderful! Basically, don't get this lock if you don't want to waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to reset the code & work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Padlocks have come a long way since I was a kid... The set of 2 that I ordered arrived individually boxed (cute, itty-bitty boxes) in mini ziplock bags indicating that I needed to go to a website for an instructive video to learn how to reset the codes. Resetting the code on the first one was cake. The second one, not so much. The lock kept sticking, but I’m pretty stubborn and eventually I was able to reset it. I like everything about these padlocks and if the need arises, I’ll buy more from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Toops

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Given as gift, after researching the many options out there. Seems to be a very sturdy lock. Granddaughter went to site for combo info and says had no trouble programming it. Meant for gym locker, so don't know how weatherproof it is, but certainly does seem as though that wouldn't be a problem. Four stars because I don't know how well it will wear.Delivery prompt, packaged well, price good.
customer_reviews.author: Lunggislanda.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but hard to read in glare
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the bright green because it would be easy to see, and it is. It was easy to set with the well written directions provided (both included in the box, and emailed!). I found, however, that the shiny background on the numbers created a glare, and without my glasses (I'm not blind, honestly), it was difficult to make out the numbers, as there wasn't enough contrast to see them clearly in the low light of the gym dressing room. It would be nice if maybe the numbers were a black/white or white/black-and/or larger.
customer_reviews.author: P D Hill

customer_reviews.title: light, sturdy, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11-year-old son's locker at space camp. He programmed his 4-digit code into it easily, and it has worked perfectly ever since. It's small and easy for a child or an adult to deal with. The number click as they turn, and it provides a little resistance, so the numbers don't freewheel, but turn one number at a time. It seems solid and sturdy, but doesn't weigh too much. My son says it's the perfect weight to play with, and now he loves playing with the lock in his hand. I can't find a negative to include in this review.
customer_reviews.author: D. Campisi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set and compact design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a garden gate and it has a thin enough shaft to fit through the latch lock. It is also easy to adjust from the side to set the numbers to open the lock which is why I went with this design instead of a lock with the combination wheels on the bottom of the lock. Very easy to set the new combination and unlike the Master locks a special tool is not needed. What I do not know at this time is how well it will hold up to the weather. I will be dosing it with WD-40 and hope for the best. For inside use I would not hesitate to recommend this padlock.
customer_reviews.author: WinterTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lock! I finally decided to purchase a lock of more quality versus continuing to buy the cheap locks and replace them because of poor quality. So glad that I did! Super easy to set up to the combo I wanted and appears much more durable. I have it on my outside gate lock, in the weather for the past few months. No problems. Quality lock.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! What a great item I am so glad I researched and found this!! We needed a combination padlock and I wasn't having much luck getting good recommendations from anyone. So I did some research online and this one had really good review so I thought I'd go for this one! Bought 2, we need these to lock our fence gates to our yard. VERY easy to program the combination, sleek design,simple to use.... fits our needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Sue42

customer_reviews.title: Right size for my application
customer_reviews.text: The hasp provided with my plastic/resin outdoor shed would not accommodate the padlocks I had around the house. Either the hole on the hasp was too small or the padlock shackle too short to make the insertion. This lock fit perfectly. Also I did not want another key to keep track of - I prefer combination locks. Time will tell if the lock stands up to the weather. The padlock was packaged professionally and shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Coupeville

customer_reviews.title: Attempted theft, lock served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Some jacka** attempted to break this lock at my gym (which was housing my car keys, wallet and iPhone among other things) using something with a blunt end (screwdriver, hammer). This lock withstood the pounding, better than the locker door which ended up with several deep holes. Unfortunately, I have only had this lock for a few months and the lock itself is no longer functional as the potential thief damaged the alignment of the hook, BUT it did its job and protected my belongings, so I'm extremely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find your locker...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lock overall, however, it is a con that the lock has to be on the combination in order to lock it. That seems so weird to me. The lock should close regardless of what the combination is on. The current method exposes you to having others see your combination when rushing to close it. I’m usually in a hurry and don’t have time to leave the lock on the exact combo just to close it. Is anyone else having this problem? Or is this simply how the lock is designed? The color is a plus for being unique.
customer_reviews.author: Teachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Better Than That Other Lock Company!
customer_reviews.text: I was alittle spectacle about the claims of this lock; it replaced a heavy duty plastic clad lock from a very famous and popular lock company. That lock, which is plastic clad, started to rust in the lock mechanism and the key wouldn’t remove. This lock was easy to program a combo from the enclosed pamphlet and so far it’s holding up to the rain and sprinkler system. Easy to open and lock. Can’t ask for more than a lock that does what it’s suppose to do! If I could wish for anything more it would be a lock with alittle more “beef” to it. Haven’t tried to break the lock and I’m not about to try just yet!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Streffacio

customer_reviews.title: Broken/Defective straight out of box
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Straight out of the box, shackle/pin would not go into the gap to set combination as instructed. With enough force it could go partially in, but then no numbers could be turned. Therefore no combination could be set. Was very frustrating to not have a working padlock when I needed one. I returned this and bought a padlock from a local gym - was half the price and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Very good self set combination lock
customer_reviews.text: Very good self set combination lock. A reasonable size compared to the small flimsy rinky dink TSA combination locks. Not as heavy weight and substantial as the Masterlock or Sesame full size combination locks; but quite reasonable say for a gym or swim or exercise locker. Easy to set, reset and use. Very handy to throw in your gym bag. I use it to lock my lockable box over my Level 2 outdoor electrical outlet for my portable car charger. But since it is such a good mid size self settable combination lock, I am getting another one for my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. I wanted a gym lock, no outside usage. After 3 mos. it started to jam and I had to reset the lock. It would work for a week and jam again. After the third reset I messaged customer service and they got back to me and asked for some more details. I explained I went thru their instructions but it seemed impossible to fix after the last jam. They got back quickly and asked if it had been dropped. No, it hadn't. Never heard back from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym lock
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the gym for about 2 months now and it's been great. I got the blue one and I can see it from the end of the locker room which is nice because I don't even have to say anything and my husband will know where it is when we go to the gym together and he doesn't go straight to the locker room. Easy to set up and easy to open when you have the combination. I can't say anything about the strength of the metal though. I haven't tried to cut it... and hopefully no one else will either! Anyway, great lock for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KLEW

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently joined the YMCA and she has dyscalculia (the numeric version of dyslexia), so standard spinning combination locks were overwhelming for her. As she can program this with whatever four-digit code she wants, and each number is moved individually, she has had no trouble using this lock. It was easy to set the code and she has been using it several times a week for a few weeks now with no issues. If anything changes, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: is holding up nicely outside in the weather elements
customer_reviews.text: A handy lock that, so far, is holding up nicely outside in the weather elements.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Structurally well made - BUT - not very ergonomic and not for a locker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping I could use it for the locker at the gym. Well made lock & solid, BUT, not very ergonomic and not for a locker. Combination is at 90 degrees from your point of view; for the guy next to you in the locker room to look at. While there are ways around this challenge, not worth the effort. gave it a month and now re-purposing. Package arrived on time without instructions how to set it up. Service gets six stars; I had an email follow up after order arrival. They sent instructions via a separate email and quickly responded to my challenge with the ergonomics / combination location.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this padlock. It's well-designed, great quality, and Desired Tools has wonderful customer service. The padlock comes with easy to follow instructions of how to set your own combination. If reading isn't for you, there's also a video online. After my purchase, I received a kind email from one of the associates checking to make sure the delivery was on time and to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase. I appreciated that personal touch. This is the first item I have ever purchased from Desired Tools, but I will definitely purchase more from the company in the future. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E.F

customer_reviews.title: READ instructions on website, DON’T watch video!
customer_reviews.text: VERY IMPORTANT-DO NOT watch video on website of how to set new combinations, instead read the instructions just underneath the video!!!! The video leaves key steps out and was driving me crazy thinking the lock was defective until I read the instructions below it. Now it seems to work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JohannaK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set your own combination! I've tried it a few times and it seems pretty easy to use and there is no problems with opening it. I have no idea if it's weatherproof though because I use it indoors. eta: I liked it so much I got a second one in blue. :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Thiessen

customer_reviews.title: Good gym lock
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because it meets my needs. Last lock, I lost my key, at the gym, and that was frustrating. I was thinking about getting a combination lock, but did not feel like keeping the combination numbers in my head. And what a relief, I found this lock, on Amazon, that is designed to create your own combination numbers. I used a series of numbers, that related to something in my lifetime. It was very easy to set the numbers up and this company was available to help me, if needed. But, the instructions and process was so easy, it took me under a minute, to set my own combination.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W. Boivin

customer_reviews.title: I am giving it five stars but don't take it as a blanket endorsement
customer_reviews.text: I would like to buy a combination lock for indoor and outdoor applications, weather resistant, difficult to defeat the lock, and easy to change the combination. And something at $15 or less. You can't have all that for $15. I could not find that at any price. So I settled on this lock because my least important criteria was an absolutely secure lock. It operates fine, but it is clearly not for applications that need a really secure lock. For my application, the biggest con is that you can't scramble the dials before you close the lock back up.
customer_reviews.author: N B

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect beach locker lock!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beach locker and always purchased expensive well known brands that rusted out before the summer was over. I could never use the expensive lock more than one season. It was very difficult to lock and unlock before the end of August. I took a chance on this $12.00 lock because I liked the color and could spot it easily. This lock has out performed the leading locks on the market today. It is waterproof and salt proof. It is just as good today as when I put it on the locker in May. I think I may be able to use next year as well. This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: Change your code lock love
customer_reviews.text: When I received this lock I remember saying, omg, I have to set the code! What in the world... So, I read the directions, and guess what?... It was easy. Flawless, simple, and the little turn number buttons are easy to move and don't hurt my fingers. I'm actually thinking about ordering another one...A spare maybe. I use it and the gym and my gym (planet fitness) has those small locker holes, but it works on those lockers fine, and it's not tight. Definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cane313

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock to place on my root cellar. I wasn't looking for one to lock it down like it was Fort Knox. I just needed a simple lock that would keep a kid or nosey neighbor from going in. I own a similar Master Lock, and this one is definitely better made. The numerical dials turn easily unlike my master lock which barely turns. It is outside of course and weather may affect it over time, but I expect for it to be a good lock for the money. I would order it again without hesitation. The customer service was very helpful. They even sent an email and a video to help me set a combination.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Good lock. Personal lighting problem.
customer_reviews.text: The lock is good, solid, but the numbers are hard to see without my readers when there is bright lighting. Seller support for the product was excellent. Before I even received it they had reached out to me with valuable information on how to set the lock code. That was nice to see. I'll have to figure a way around my issue with it. I'd hate to have to lug around readers to the gym as well.
customer_reviews.author: FTG

customer_reviews.title: Password stops working
customer_reviews.text: I made the password for my son before giving it to him as a gift. The very first time he tries to use it the password does not work! This makes no sense as I tested it to make sure it did. I guess it picks and chooses when to work. That is not ok. My son is now mad at me! He thinks I did not do it right or something. I bought this to help him and not to make him frustrated. He now has to go to the gym without a lock.
customer_reviews.author: BASIL

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Lock
customer_reviews.text: I got the red, and it is beautiful and easy to spot in the locker room. The lock is well made. I've been using it everyday for several weeks now and so far it's working fine with no issues. The dials are easy to turn and stays in place perfectly. The combination is easy to set. I like that it is not big and bulky like the traditional locks that is heavy. This one is sturdy, but lighter than most locks on the market.
customer_reviews.author: kitty pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use Padlock!
customer_reviews.text: I've used several padlocks before and this so far has been the best. This feels extremely durable and built with great materials/mechanism. Specifically, a common problem with padlocks is overtime, when turning the combination, the gears would wear and eventually, creating new combinations or using your already existing combo can easily break. This does not seem to be the case with this one. I purchased two separately although I wish they had a deal for a 2pack, that would be great! Nonetheless, this has fared well so far, no signs of rust yet with this lock but will update in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Long-Term Product Reviews by Hugh&Co.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I got an email from the seller directing me to a video on setting the lock combination. It worked as shown. It would be nice if the combination was on the side of the lock; easier to see when placed on a locker door. However, you can set the combination on the vertical face showing out, 2 clicks from the current combination location. In other words, if your combination is 1234, on the vertical side it is 3456! Neat. If problems develop, I will revisit this review.
customer_reviews.author: rande

customer_reviews.title: I love this lock!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this a few weeks ago and it's much better than the rotate-the-dial type I had used before (which broke). This is a relatively lightweight, but very sturdy lock. I use it at the gym and am comfortable my belongings are secure. The It's easy to program the four-digit code of your choice, and is much faster to open than the rotating dial type. Delivery came quickly. I highly recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: For outdoor use, so far so good
customer_reviews.text: We are using it to lock up some camping gear while camping and have only had an opportunity to use it one time. The weather was perfect - that is, no rain, snow etc. - so it's hard to know how well it will hold up in more adverse conditions, but it is also placed in a weather-safe place, so we don't expect any problems. I do like it's easy readability, and we like the color red as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Mi

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price and overall sturdy lock for lockers and/or luggage.
customer_reviews.text: I use this lock at the gym when I use lockers to store my belongings. I also use it for my luggage while traveling and sometimes as an additional/secondary lock for my pistol range bag. I was drawn to the color and design of this lock. Once I had it in my hands and inspected it, I appreciated its quality; it is sturdier than most locks of its size and design. The combination feature is very user-friendly. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Ace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set new combination anytime, but....
customer_reviews.text: Good for a gym locker, but it is definitely not what I would use for a bicycle or something like that. The locking mechanism is at the side of the U that is attached to the body, and the other side is just smooth and doesn't go into the body very deep at all. I think it could be pryed open without too much trouble. Also, the lock can't be CLOSED unless the combination is displayed. So anytime it is unlocked, your combination is exposed... Not a big deal to me, but worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Solvesky

customer_reviews.title: One small dislike, but a it's a good lock overall
customer_reviews.text: Great lock and nice that I can change the combo. I don't like that I have to have it set at the correct combination in order to lock it, though. Sometimes I leave it unlocked on the locker handle for a second before I lock the locker closed and I don't want to leave it on the combo so people can see it, but I also don't want to have to re-enter the correct combo just to lock it. Despite that, it works great and I have had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: Good basic padlock that I use for gym locker. It is compact and easy to use: instructions are clear, dials are not loose and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. The color allows me to spot my storage unit easily as well. If we get another unit, I'll be ordering another one of these. Your Review: This is my second review - have ordered two more since the above review.... Really fast shipment. Third one I've bought so that ought to tell you something. One thing I especially like is the color choices. It's easy to tell my storage units because they're the only ones with blue locks! Easy to set the combination and easy to open. Don't even need my glasses to see the numbers to open the lock! If I need another padlock, I'll buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: L. McQuillen

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week, company replaced the lock at no charge.
customer_reviews.text: My son used this lock for his locker at school. It worked for exactly one week. Had to have the janitor cut it off today. He said it’s not the first lock like that he’s had to cut off. These things are absolute crap. ETA; this company sent a replacement lock after reading the review. They were kind and apologetic and tried very hard to rectify the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Secure enough for low value protection.
customer_reviews.text: As with most low cost locks, this works well enough to secure low value items. It serves to protect your items from curious and mostly honest people, Dedicated thieves however, will defeat it with a little persistence and little effort. I have insufficient experience to evaluate its durability. So far, no problems. Considering its limitations, it's a reasonable value.
customer_reviews.author: Sieghorn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lock jammed and had to be cutoff my locker at work. Very embarrassing!!
customer_reviews.author: annoyed

customer_reviews.title: If you need readers maybe this lock is not for you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little lock, and it works well as a lock, but if you need to use reading glasses, beware! It’s extremely difficult to read the numbers and impossible for me to see them in the locker room where I work out, even with my readers! I wrote to the seller asking if I could exchange for a lock that’s easier to read but received no response. It’s almost as much to ship back as the product cost so I will give the lock to someone with laser vision. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Seems Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is better than locks with plastic parts-- good for a locker. Like any moderately priced lock, this would not stand up to a bolt cutter or other heavy duty thievery but it is fine for the gym. No key to lose and it was simple to set the combination (38 second video online). The weight feels good--sturdy. Easy to open and the color (I got the green) makes it easy to spot. Slim enough not to stick out otherwise (See photos. I have small hands). Don't know about weatherproof as I use it only indoors. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Davvero

customer_reviews.title: Numbers Very Reflective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on a gym locker. The lock worked fine as far as setting the code and locking and re-locking. I had two issues though. One was that the numbers were really hard to turn. But the biggest problem was that when I was in the brightly lit locker room the lights reflected off of the shiny silver metal behind the numbers making it almost impossible to see the numbers. I ended up purchasing one with matte black behind white numbers and that works much better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy Duty, But...
customer_reviews.text: But, for most people it is just the ticket. Yes there are reviews that show that someone who was not concerned about being discovered managed to mangle one of these things with some sort of heavy duty tool...but for the most of us it is used when going to the local workout place and it that regard I am pretty happy. Being able to set my own code is nice...just use the one for my debit card and there you go.
customer_reviews.author: Faja4x

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, durable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, durable, tough, and quality made lock that not only feels great but looks great. I put a ton of personal items in the locker at the gym including my weapon, my wallet, my cellphone, car keys, etc.and I want to make sure that what I put in the locker, stays in the locker. With this lock, I feel safe knowing my items are securely locked in a sturdy and thick lock that can't be pulled to break open. Super easy set up with instructions and takes about a minute to set the lock code and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: John Betts

customer_reviews.title: Solid and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace another padlock I had, which had the unfortunate tendency to "freeze" during freezing weather and almost locking me out of my storage locker. I got this baby - which is heavy and appears sturdy and well-made - and so far I have had no issues regardless of the temperature - it locks and unlocks reliably. Note that I have only used it indoors, not outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: BG in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Don't need a key to unlock your gate or tool shed.
customer_reviews.text: I need a padlock for the outside entrance to my back yard so I don't have to bring a key every time I go through the gate. This padlock, unlike the one I replaced, is sturdy, well made, nice looking and operates smoothly. You can set the four-digit code of your choice following the instruction provided. I liked it so much that I ordered another set right away for my tool shed. The only reason I didn't give a 5-star rating is that the numerals are not colored but simply indented, so they are hard to read, especially at night even with a flash light. Coloring the numerals white would greatly improve the contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Chen

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Changed the combo. Tested it in front of my wife. Its a code we use for everything, no chance of us forgetting. Went to the gym. Tested it again before i put it on. Fast forward 45 minutes and im asking the manager for their bolt cutters. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Gary H

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock to use on a deep freezer door locking system. The product seems durable. The included instruction card helped me change the password in less than a minute. I like it. The seller reached out to make sure I was happy with the product. I like the fact that it has 4 digits instead of 3. I'm happy with the purchase and I appreciate the customer service follow up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L.

customer_reviews.title: heavy to carry to gym
customer_reviews.text: it is good quality but big and heavy for me ,for gym purpose. returning it. i don't wanna carry around something heavy to gym. returning.but 5 stars because customer service is nice enough to care and respond nicely. And one more thing i can tell, i ordered small and lightweight ones i got them yesterday, they re for luggage and small size, i can tell i did not like the quality as much as i like this one. and one more thing ,all people at gym they have similar size lock to this and probably heavy like this. I guess it just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: lldigihead

customer_reviews.title: I suppose it's great if you can set the combination and get it open . . . .
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lock for a gym I recently joined. I did quite a bit of reading of reviews on Amazon, and this was highly rated. Unfortunately, we were not able to open the lock after setting it. As the seller states it cannot be returned unless it can be opened, we are stuck paying for a lock that we can neither use or return. Greatly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Times the Charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my gym locker. Needed something simple and straightforward. The first purchase of this lock was defective. It would not turn for me to reset the factory code. When it finally did turn to reset the numbers, the digits wouldn’t move. In the end, I returned the faulty one for a new one of the same type and that one worked like a charm! I reset the lock smoothly with no problem. It’s worth it for the price but if it’s difficult to operate, order a new one. Minus one star for not working the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn

customer_reviews.title: The paint won't chip easily like the cheaper alternatives
customer_reviews.text: These are well constructed. I saw a green one on someone's locker in the gym and loved the color, so decided to order a couple myself, but ended up with red. They're not as orangish-red as appears in this image. The lighting did that. These are not difficult to set or reset as long as you take 30 seconds to read the instructions. I find it much easier to find my gym locker than looking at 50 identical black combination locks when I've forgotten where I was. ;)
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy 4th Grader
customer_reviews.text: This is the first year that our grandson is using a combination lock at school. He was overwhelmed with having to remember the numbers and turning directions for traditional locks. After we purchased this lock, he created and mastered a combination for it in no time. Now, not only can he operate his new lock quickly, he thinks it’s a pretty “cool” (red) lock as well.
customer_reviews.author: BJsNana

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Solid. Elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, and out came a solid-feeling, nice-looking lock. After perusing the instructions, I set my combination, which was very simple. I noticed that the dials turn easily, and "stick" where they are supposed to. The shackle moves easily, and has a crisp lock and unlock movement. I paid a few dollars less for similar lock made by Brinks that I think is not quite as nice as this one, and I would buy this one again before buying the brinks lock. I work at a hospital, and I use the lock to secure my stuff in my locker.
customer_reviews.author: Thugg Lyfe

customer_reviews.title: Will buy in different colors
customer_reviews.text: Great padlock. The material is sturdy and the dials run smoothly. I use this lock for day lockers in the gym and also sometime use it together with a cable as a makeshift bike lock. Quite versatile. It’s way better than those traditional padlock because you don’t need to spin the spinner anymore and you get to customize your own password. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: quad

customer_reviews.title: Good, Good, Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lock. Setting the combo is easy, but not so simple a process that someone else is going to redo it and take your stuff. It’s nice to have a color choice, too, and it makes it easy to remember which locker you used at the gym. It’s sturdy and inexpensive; a perfect choice for medium security situations. The customer service from this company is great, by the way. You won’t be sorry you chose this product!
customer_reviews.author: karla kenyonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Solid and easy to spot!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great padlock--easy to program and the colors make it easy to spot especially in a big locker room. The only reservation I have is that the combination is on the side and you cannot easily see it if your lock is in a recessed space. HOWEVER, instead of the combination you can remember the numbers that show on the front of the lock when your combination is set. For example, if 0000 is the combination aligned on the side then 3333 --in the sample above-- shows on the front.
customer_reviews.author: LizW

customer_reviews.title: ... almost...
customer_reviews.text: this appeared to be a perfect solution...except, the dial locks are black numerals on chrome spinning wheels...what could be wrong with that ? ...well the athletic club had Bright LED floodlights in the locker room, and the reflection off the spinning wheels made it very difficult to read the individual numbers...who would have guessed ???
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B

customer_reviews.title: Would not reset combination
customer_reviews.text: Returned this. The process to reset the combination did not work rendering this lock unusable. I tried contacting customer service but they suggested a try different combinations "around" the numbers I had initially input as my reset since numbers sometimes shift during reset. Do you know how many different combinations of numbers you can come up with when there are 4 different digits? No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Buchan

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT YOU CANNOT FULFILL RETURN REQUIREMENTS
customer_reviews.text: I FOLLOWED INSTRUCTIONS; OPENDED AS VIDEO SAID, RENUMERATED CODE AND THEN TURNED IT BACK AND CLSOED IT. I MOVED ONE LETTER IN THE CODE TO SEE IF IT WAS WORKING; IT DID, IT WOULD NOT OPEN; I CHENGED THE ONE WHEEL TO THE CORRECT NUMBER - IT WOULD NOT OPEN. INSTRUCTIONS SAY TO MAIL IT BACK; AND THEY CANNONT ACCEPT IT UNLESS IT HAS BEEN RESET TO: 0 - 0 - 0 - 0 BUT IF I COULD NOT REOPEN IT AGAIN I CANNOT FULFIL RETURN POLICY. I NEVER WRITE REVIEWS BUT I DON'T WANT ANYBODY ELSE TO GET CAUGHT; IT'S NOT ABOUT THE MONEY,,,ITS ABOUT PRODUCT RELIABILITY,
customer_reviews.author: W R WITTE

customer_reviews.title: No more need for keys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these locks--one for an outside gate, and one for a locker. They've been great for both jobs. I really like that I can give my dog walker the gate lock code, and not have to worry about yet another key. Both locks work well, no sticking, and the numeric tumblers are easy to use. Also very easy to program in your own set of numbers. If I need more padlocks, I'll definitely be getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Circejane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and affordable; does the gym locker job
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me the green one for my gym locker. I loved it so much I bought him this blue one. Easy to set your own 4-digit code, easy to move the keys back and forth, durable, great for casual use such as gym locker. It can probably be cut by bolt cutters so don’t invest if you’re looking to protect something incredibly valuable or something someone desperately wants into. But for basic use, 5 star—affordable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye, RD

customer_reviews.title: Great Digital Combination Lock
customer_reviews.text: After years of using the old style twist combination lock, I decided to try one that is more simple to use. This lock is perfect, and I recommend it. I received an e-mail msg from the company recommending that I view their website which shows a step-by-step instruction of how to set the new digital combination. When I rec'd the lock, I followed the instructions, and the lock has work perfectly. Oh yeah, I know longer have to squint at the small numbers on my old lock! Good product,
customer_reviews.author: Ted H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid and dependable!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to put a combination lock on a shared cabinet. I bought a different model from Amazon, at half this price, but found the tumbler broke after just a few uses. I switched to this model and found it has been much better! The hasp feel sturdy and solid. I highly recommend this lock, as I am purchasing two more for my shed and for our travels.
customer_reviews.author: KARL LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Unit is a bit small
customer_reviews.text: This lock appears to work well so far. The shank is a bit small and could probably be readily breached with an aggressive pair of bolt cutters. It has been out in the weather a bit and so far still functions well. Will see how it goes thru the winter. The sellers were good to deal with and the unit arrived on time well packed. Setting the combination was easy and a much better solution than the Master lock ring number set up.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jan B. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Used for classroom escape box.
customer_reviews.text: These are great locks to use in classrooms because they are easy to change the combination on. I used these in an activity with 6-8th grade students. I had to set up 6 of them. It was soooo easy to set them all up. It took me less than 10 minutes. I will use them in another activity and can easily change the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Martyso

customer_reviews.title: The Lock code Doesnt Change
customer_reviews.text: Hello Team, I am really upset with the lock I purchased. I came with the lock for travel and when I am trying to re-set the code from 000 to new code I am unable to do so. I also went through the Youtube video to confirm that I am doing it correctly but I am unable to re-set. After setting the code when I bring it back to 180 and try to pull the lever up, it does not come back. Since I am travelling I can not raise a replace order now. I am really upset with this product. Please refund my money. I will refund the money, once I am back in the town.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi kumar Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: 2 padlocks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these combination locks and after carefully reading instructions (the Manufacturer sent me those by e-mails that were larger than the ones that come with the locks), I had no trouble setting a new combination on both locks. As per instructions, I checked them both before putting them on. I have checked one lock after it had been on for a few days outside, and worked perfectly. I am very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this lock for my gym locker, which it is great for. It's got a nice design and seems well-made despite it being fairly cheap. That said, I've seen reviews and videos showing how easy it is to crack these locks, so be mindful of that. I don't know if others around this price point would be any more secure, though.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Lock Appears to Work as Expected.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lock to use on my backyard shed (so only time will tell if holds up). So far, though, we've had a lot of snowy/rainy days and I don't see any immediate rust or faulty issues with the lock. So, that's a good sign. Overall, the sturdiness of the lock seems good and certainly hope it lasts for quite some time. I'll update this review if I find anything further. Otherwise, it's doing it's job without any issue(s) at all and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janky Jay

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: We are replacing a big, bulky customizable lock we were using previously for gym lockers. This lock is a great size - big enough to be easy to use, but small enough to not be bulky. Lightweight as well. It was very easy to set, the instructions that came with it were clear and there is even a link to a video. I’m looking forward to replacing our other lock with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erik and Crystal

customer_reviews.title: nice product.  great service from "desired things"
customer_reviews.text: good product. bought two. works as advertised. easy to set code. nice weight and seems well built. one functional note that surprised me: you can't spin the combo and THEN close the lock. you must have code correctly set in order to close lock. If kiddo at locker during period and bunch of neighbors fighting for space, being able to close lock without combo set would be BEST. Instead, you must have code set, close lock, and at same time spin combo -- ie. requires two hands. Not ideal but may have affected my original purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: GarrettA

customer_reviews.title: It's very small
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I read were a bit misleading. I'll be honest, I haven't used the lock and I didn't read the dimensions. Bad on me. This lock looks like something that *might* be ok to use on a school locker, but I live in a city and I need a hefty lock for my gate. This is NOT hefty by any means. It's small and looks like it could be easily cut thru. Nowhere on the packaging does it say it's weatherproof so... I'm returning it. I gave it 3 stars because I didn't use it, but it's also not going to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Had one that worked fine. Lost it
customer_reviews.text: Had one that worked fine. Lost it, ordered a replacement, and it's broken to the point where I can't set the combination and the default combination doesn't work. Have to ship it back to get a refund, not worth the hassle for a simple combination lock. EDIT: Based on this review seller sent me a replacement without having to do a return. Confirms my suspicion that the last one was broken (damaged or defective). So, 2 out of 3 of these I've had have worked fine. Bumping up to three stars.
customer_reviews.author: King Skot

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Received the lock. Setup directions are smooth and easy to set. But after using it a couple of times, the combination wouldn't work. Apparently, one of the numbers changed. How? I do not know. Luckily I figured the new combo out after several attempts. Not sure why it happened then but has not happened since and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Red Head

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: The lock was delivered on time and was exactly as represented. It is heftier than I thought which in this case is probably a good thing since I Do use it as a lock for my exercise clothing locker.do use it as a lock for my exercise clothing locker and don’t intend to lug it around. The neon colors also make it very easy to spot. I have no problem setting the lock and certainly no problem locking and unlocking it subsequent to that. Pretty great item And four digits on the combination makes it much harder to hack.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not All Weather
customer_reviews.text: A year and a half after I got two of these for my gates, the loop shackle of both is deeply rusted. I live in Florida where it is humid and it rains a lot, so maybe they would do better elsewhere. However, for me, if that is expected longevity, I’ll need to weigh the cost of replacing every 18 months compared to expensive high grade professional locks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mclarty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I started a new job and needed a lock for my locker. I wanted a code padlock so I wouldn't need to carry a key around. I tried a traditional padlock but would get so frustrated turning the dial. I love this padlock. Chose the combination i wanted, bright color makes my locker easy to find. I have even dropped the padlock on the ground a few times without any problems. Love is lock!
customer_reviews.author: TamTam

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the lock for a few days. It is for an outside gate and we have had a hard time finding a lock to work long-term in the elements. We are hoping this lock will last more than 3 months. The only thing I dislike is that you cannot change the number on the lock if it is open so it has to be in the lock position at all times to change the combination
customer_reviews.author: Noelia B. Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: The Goods
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice look and feel. The instructions to reset combination is simple enough to remember. Haven't tested for all weather purposes but seems like it could hold without rusting. Cons: I feel the locking pin could go down deeper into the body of the lock to prevent it from accidentally opening or early broken into. The $12 price tag isn't all to appealing for just one lock. I thought it came with 2 locks and felt it was more of inconvenience to return. Ehh...it's $12. Neutral: the lock is bigger than I expected. Slightly smaller than one's palm.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock because the one I had was broken in to and my phone was stolen. At first I liked this lock because it looked sturdy, once I examine it, I liked it even more. the process to make your on combination its pretty easy. I tested it with different tools and so far I'm happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Victor A. Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of the spinning dials!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for practical locks for my backyard gate that is about 4 feet tall and my shed. Letting my puppy through the gate by leaning over and unlocking it from the other side with one hand is great. The number dials are easy and large enough to see in dim light and use with my hand. I live on Maui and only about 200 yards from the beach so we will see if the salt air will do its diligence. I will say overall the locks look and feel solid and the sizes of them are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ekingt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Design and function are great. Build quality a little shaky. I broke one by dropping it. Another one was apparently broken into successfully. So I probably should have moved on to a sturdier lock, but I’ve had even worse luck with others, and I don’t have too much to protect in my gym locker anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: EagerEyes

product_meta.title: Padlock - 4 Digit Combination Lock for Gym, Sports, School & Employee Locker, Outdoor, Fence, Hasp and Storage - All Weather Metal & Steel - Easy to Set Your Own Keyless Resettable Combo - Green
product_meta.description:
Color:Green
4 Digit Combination Lock by desired tools 
Made of weatherproof zinc alloy and plated steel and is suited for: 
Gym/Sports, school & employee locker, cases, hasps and general storage. 
Setting or re-setting your own combination is simple and straight forward. 
Please see the size of the product by viewing the images on the top left of the page. 

Inside Package: 
➤ 1 Padlock (Combination Lock). Size: 3.25" x 1.7" x 0.7". Weight: 5oz. 

We Provide: 
✓ 30 Days Money Back Guarantee 
✓ Manufacturer Warranty 
✓ Secure Payment & Shipping 
✓ Genuine Customer Care 

How does the Money Back Guarantee work? 
If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 30 days, 
simply reply to the shipping email that you will have received from us and 
let us know about the issue. We will assist you within one day. 

Click ADD TO CART on the top of this page now to protect your belongings.
feature_bullets: Padlock for gym, school & employee lockers, outdoor fences, hasps and storages.
Lock offers 10,000 unique combinations which discourages the thief to crack the code.
Numbers are easy to read, maneuver, set and reset to your own personal code.
We allow you to select your color, unlike most sellers. See all available colors above.
Your purchase is protected by our 30 Day Money Back Guarantee & Manufacturer Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars9,339 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
